revision.text:
{{short description|Indian film directed by Tannishtha Chatterjee.}} {{Use dmy dates|date=September 2019}} {{Use Indian English|date=October 2019}} {{Infobox film | name = Roam Rome Mein | image = Roam Rome Mein.jpg | imagesize = | alt = | caption = First look poster | film name = | director = [[Tannishtha Chatterjee]] | producers = {{unbulleted list|[[Eros International]]|Pankaj Razdan}} | writer = {{unbulleted list|[[Tannishtha Chatterjee]]}} | screenplay = Tannishtha Chatterjee | story = | based on = | starring = {{unbulleted list|[[Nawazuddin Siddiqui]]|[[Tannishtha Chatterjee]]|[[Valentina Corti]]| [[Isha Talwar]]|[[Vineet Kumar]]|Andrea Scarduzio| Francesco Apolloni|[[Urbano Barberini]]|[[Pamela Villoresi]]}} | narrator = | music = [[Alokananda Dasgupta]] | cinematography = Sunita Radia | editing = Protim Khaound
Archit Rastogi | production companies = [[Eros International]]
Rising Star Entertainment | distributor = | released = {{Film date|2019|10||Busan}} | runtime = | country = India | language = [[English language|English]], [[Hindi]] and [[Italian language|Italian]]{{Cite web|url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/nawazuddin-siddiquis-roam-rome-mein-will-premier-at-busan-film-festival-2019/articleshow/71023627.cms|title=Nawazuddin Siddiqui’s ‘Roam Rome Mein’ will premier at Busan Film Festival 2019 - Times of India|website=The Times of India}} | budget = | gross = }} '''''Roam Rome Mein''''' is an upcoming [[Indian Cinema|Indian]] [[psychological]]-[[drama]]{{Cite web|url=https://boxofficeindia.co.in/nawazuddin-siddiqui-%E2%80%98s-roam-rome-mein-premiere-busan|title=Nawazuddin Siddiqui ‘s Roam Rome Mein to premiere in Busan|date=6 September 2019|website=Box Office India}} film directed by [[Tannishtha Chatterjee]], and produced by Eros International, Pankaj Razdan, and Rising Star Entertainment. It features [[Nawazuddin Siddiqui]], [[Tannishtha Chatterjee]] and [[Valentina Corti]] in main roles. It also includes a supporting cast of Vineet Kumar, Andrea Scarduzio, Ciera Foster and Priyansh Jora.{{Cite news|url=https://www.business-standard.com/article/pti-stories/tannishtha-chatterjee-s-directorial-debut-roam-rome-mein-to-premiere-at-busan-film-festival-119090600793_1.html|title=Tannishtha Chatterjee's directorial debut 'Roam Rome Mein' to premiere at Busan Film Festival|last=India|first=Press Trust of|date=2019-09-06|work=Business Standard India|access-date=2019-09-11}}{{Cite web|url=https://www.cinestaan.com/articles/2019/sep/5/22376|title=Roam Rome Mein, 99 Songs, Dolly Kitty Aur Woh Chamakte Sitare to have world premiere at Busan|last=Pandya|first=Sonal|website=Cinestaan|access-date=2019-09-11}} The film premiered on 5 October at [[24th Busan International Film Festival#Program|24th Busan International Film Festival]] held from 3 to 12 October 2019. It was showcased in "A Window on Asian Cinema". This film marks directorial debut for actress [[Tannishtha Chatterjee]].{{Cite web|url=https://www.firstpost.com/entertainment/roam-rome-mein-tannishtha-chatterjees-directorial-debut-to-premiere-at-busan-international-film-festival-7297101.html|title=Roam Rome Mein: Tannishtha Chatterjee's directorial debut to premiere at Busan International Film Festival- Entertainment News, Firstpost|date=2019-09-06|website=Firstpost|language=en|access-date=2019-09-11}}{{Cite web|url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/a-motley-cast-for-nawazuddin-siddiquis-roam-rome-mein/articleshow/65593749.cms|title=A motley cast for Nawazuddin Siddiqui's 'Roam Rome Mein' - Times of India|website=The Times of India|language=en|access-date=2019-09-11}} The film is in English , Hindi and Italian.{{Cite web|url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/bollywood/tannishtha-chatterjee-roam-rome-mein-6032086/|title=Roam Rome Mein is a feminist film with a male protagonist: Tannishtha Chatterjee|date=27 September 2019}} ==Synopsis== The film revolves around Reena ([[Tannishtha Chatterjee]]), who goes to [[Rome]], Italy to find her freedom from strict patriarchal father, and Raj ([[Nawazuddin Siddiqui]]), her brother, and his journey of awakening as he goes to find her and in the journey he learns things about Reena’s life as well as his own.{{Cite web|url=http://www.biff.kr/eng/html/program/prog_view.asp?idx=44454&c_idx=332&sp_idx=&QueryStep=2|title=A Window on Asian Cinema|website=Busan International Film Festival}} ==Cast== * [[Nawazuddin Siddiqui]] as Raj * [[Tannishtha Chatterjee]] as Reena * Valentina Corti * [[Isha Talwar]] * Francesco Apollini * [[Urbano Barberini]] * [[Pamela Villoresi]] * [[Vineet Kumar]] * Andrea Scarduzio * Ciera Foster * Priyansh Jora * Giada Benedetti * Tanuka Laghate *Arshia Verma as young Reena ==Release== The film had its World premiere at [[Busan International Film Festival]] held from 3 to 12 October 2019. It had its European premiere at [[International Rome Film Festival]] https://www.romacinemafest.it/en/news/highlights/highlights-rome-film-fest/2019/10/04/preopening-screening-2019/ and Indian premiere at [[Mumbai Film Festival]] [[Mumbai Academy of the Moving Image|MAMI]]. ==Awards== [[Tannishtha Chatterjee]] won the Asia Star award presented by [[Marie Claire]] at the [[Busan International Film Festival]] 2019. https://www.theweek.in/news/entertainment/2019/10/05/tannishtha-chatterjee-honoured-with-asia-star-award-at-biff.html ==Reviews== Paroleacolori.com called the directors work of great artistic , sociological , cultural value and of notable emotional impact. Vittorio de Argo reviewed it at Rome film festival said Roam Rome Mein captivated the audience and impressed even your old and cynical sent. An ambitious , particular, lively film full of twists and stylistically innovative and bold choices.https://paroleacolori.com/roam-rome-mein-recensione-film/ Cinecircoloromano.it called the film Unique and original.https://www.cinecircoloromano.it/2019/10/qui-cinema-ottobre-2019/roma-xiv-2019-roam-rome-mein-recensione-di-rossella-pozza/ Cinematographe.it called it a cinematic jewel which treats the role of women in society as a subject with originality as never before.https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=it&u=https://www.cinematographe.it/recensioni/roam-rome-mein-recensione/&prev=search [[The Hollywood Reporter]] has reviewed it as a crowd pleasing fantasy with a feminist punch which found strong audience support in initial outings at the Busan, Mumbai and Rome film festivals.https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/review/inch-my-being-1249732 ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{IMDb title|tt9399168}} [[Category:Indian films]] [[Category:Upcoming Indian films]] [[Category:2019 films]] [[Category:Indian psychological drama films]] [[Category:Indian feminist films]] [[Category:Indian multilingual films]] [[Category:Films set in Rome]] [[Category:Films shot in Rome]] [[Category:2019 directorial debut films]]
